level.heading: Confidentiality of collaborative law communication.
level.text: A collaborative law communication is confidential to the extent agreed by the parties in a signed record or as provided by law of the District of Columbia other than this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-125, see notes under ยง 16-4001.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 16 of the Uniform Collaborative Law Act. See Vol. 7 , Part 1B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
